title: Usage Guide
subtitle: You can get feedback on these too
intro: "I want feedback, but who should I ask?" Percepta has the answer.

cta.title: Get started now
cta.description: Create a persona and request your first feedback.

context.title: Provide context
context.bad: What do you think of this?
context.good: This is a finance newsletter for young professionals. Will they drop off after the first paragraph?

compare.title: Give comparison options
compare.description: Upload A/B versions together to get clearer preference insights.

variety.title: Try various personas
variety.description: The same content can get completely different reactions depending on the persona.

useCases.title: Validate your business idea
useCases.situation: When you have a new business idea but aren't sure if there's real demand
useCases.howTo: Summarize your idea in 1-2 paragraphs and set up personas matching your target customers.
insights: "I would actually use this" vs "Do I really need this?"

useCases.title: Get reactions to your lyrics
useCases.situation: When you want to know how people will react before posting your lyrics or song
useCases.howTo: Enter the full lyrics and set up personas with various ages and tastes.
insights: Which age group it appeals to more
Emotional resonance and relatability of lyrics
Specific feedback like "this part feels awkward"

useCases.title: Review before publishing a blog post
useCases.situation: When you've put effort into writing but worry if readers will finish it
useCases.howTo: Enter the full text and set up personas matching your expected readers.
insights: Whether the core message comes through

useCases.title: Test ad copy
useCases.situation: When you're about to run ads but can't decide which copy works better
useCases.howTo: Enter 2-3 versions of ad copy and set up target audience personas.
insights: Which copy triggers more purchase intent

useCases.title: Get objective feedback on your resume
useCases.situation: When job hunting and can't tell if your resume is compelling
useCases.howTo: Enter your resume content and set up a persona as the hiring manager.
insights: First impression and sense of expertise

useCases.title: Rehearse your presentation script
useCases.situation: When you have an important presentation and worry about audience reaction
useCases.howTo: Enter your presentation script and set up personas matching your audience.
insights: Whether the logic flow is persuasive
Parts that raise questions or objections

useCases.title: Evaluate product descriptions
useCases.situation: When you've written a product description and want to know if it converts
useCases.howTo: Enter the product description and set up personas of likely buyers.
insights: Whether there's enough info for purchase decision

useCases.title: Draft social media posts
useCases.situation: When you've written a post and want to predict how it'll perform
useCases.howTo: Enter the post content and set up personas matching your followers.

useCases.title: Review email/proposal drafts
useCases.situation: When sending an important email or proposal and worried about the reaction
useCases.howTo: Enter the email/proposal content and set up a persona of the recipient.
insights: Whether the key message is clear
Whether it prompts the desired action

useCases.title: Test brand naming/slogans
useCases.situation: When you need to choose a brand name or slogan but can't decide
useCases.howTo: List your candidate names/slogans and set up target customer personas.
insights: Whether it fits the brand image
Whether it's easy to pronounce and familiar
